languages.text: "А я с готовностью приму свою кару, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Святой Друз учил вкушать наказание смиренно и благодарно".

traits.locale_text: "А я с готовностью приму свою кару, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Святой Друз учил не только искуплению, но и праведному воздаянию тем, кому уже слишком поздно ступать на этот путь".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."
languages.original_text: "А я с готовностью приму свою кару, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Святой Друз учил вкушать наказание смиренно и благодарно".

traits.locale_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment, my {mf|son|daughter}. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility and gratitude."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment, my {mf|son|daughter}. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility and gratitude."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment, my {mf|son|daughter}. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment, my {mf|son|daughter}. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “我渴望得到我应得的惩罚。圣德鲁苏斯教导我们，要怀着谦卑与感激之情，接受惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."

traits.locale_text: “我渴望得到我应得的惩罚，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。圣德鲁苏斯教导我们，要怀着谦卑与感激之情，接受惩罚。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「私は喜んで罪を受けよう。聖ドルススは謙虚さと感謝の気持ちを持ち備えて罰を受けるようにと教えてくださった」
languages.original_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."

traits.locale_text: 「私は喜んで罪を受けよう。聖ドルススは謙虚さと感謝の気持ちを持ち備えて罰を受けるようにと教えてくださった」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Y estaré ansioso por recibir mi castigo. San Drusus nos enseñó a recibir el castigo con humildad y gratitud».
languages.original_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."

traits.locale_text: «Y estaré ansioso por recibir mi castigo, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. San Drusus nos enseñó a recibir el castigo con humildad y gratitud».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Und ich werde meine Strafe bereitwillig empfangen. Der Heilige Drusus hat uns gelehrt, Strafen mit Demut und Dankbarkeit zu begegnen."
languages.original_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich werde meine Strafe bereitwillig empfangen, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Der Heilige Drusus hat uns gelehrt, Strafen mit Demut und Dankbarkeit zu begegnen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Et comme nous l'a appris Saint Drusus, j'accepterai mon châtiment avec humilité et gratitude. »
languages.original_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."

traits.locale_text: « Et comme nous l'a appris Saint Drusus, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}, j'accepterai mon châtiment avec humilité et gratitude. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ben de hevesle cezamı çekmeyi bekleyeceğim. Aziz Drusus, cezayı tevazuyla ve minnetle kabul etmemizi öğütler."
languages.original_text: "And I will be eager to receive my punishment. Saint Drusus taught us to partake of punishment with humility, and gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de hevesle cezamı çekmeyi bekleyeceğim. Aziz Drusus, cezayı tevazuyla kabul etmemizi öğütler. Ve de minnetle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
